instructions.instruction: Stack the glass glass on top of the green, plastic object.
Move the metal soda can to the right part of the table.
Measure the weight of the glass object.
Pick up the lightest of ceramic objects.
What is the weight of ceramic objects?
Stack ceramic objects from heaviest to lightest.
Place the lightest of ceramic objects on the right part of the table.
Place the heaviest of all ceramic objects on top of the baking tray.
Stack the ceramic mug on the brown object on the gray baking tray.
Stack the mug on top of the brown bowl.
What is the weight of the blue thermos?
Move the ceramic bowl to the right part of the table.
Pick up the heaviest of all wine glasses.
Remove all transparent, glass objects from the left part of the table.
Measure the weight of all transparent wine glasses.
Move the lightest of all wine glasses to the left part of the table.
Place the thermos on the right part of the table.
Measure the weight of the plastic thermos.
Stack the bowl on top of the food box.
Pick up the heaviest of glass objects.
Measure the weight of transparent objects.
What is the weight of the wine glass?
Remove all transparent, glass objects from the left part of the table.
Place the lightest of transparent objects on the right part of the table.
Stack the glass glass on the red food box.
Place the green, plastic object on the right part of the table.
Pick up the lightest of brown, ceramic objects.
Stack all brown, ceramic objects from heaviest to lightest.
Place the lightest of brown objects on the brown bowl.
What is the weight of all ceramic objects?
Stack the brown mug on top of the bowl.
What is the weight of the brown bowl?
Remove ceramic objects from the right part of the table.
Move the lightest of all brown, ceramic objects to the right part of the table.
Place the mug on the right part of the table.
